summary: The module implements a data fetcher that gathers reachability information for static application security testing (SAST). It creates and applies package alias mappings, validates run configurations, interacts with the Bridgecrew platform integration, and returns structured reachability data, supporting asynchronous operation.
business_intent: Enable security teams to identify which software packages are actually used in an application during SAST scans, facilitating accurate vulnerability detection, risk assessment, and compliance reporting.
